$$
\sigma_1(X)=\sum w_k|\delta_k-d_k(X)|
$$

AM/GM

$$
|\delta_k-d_k(X)|\leq\frac12\frac{1}{|\delta_k-d_k(Y)|}\{(\delta_k-d_k(X))^2+(\delta_k-d_k(Y))^2\}
$$
$$
\sigma_1(X)\leq\frac12\sum \frac{w_k}{|\delta_k-d_k(Y)|}(\delta_k-d_k(X))^2+\frac12\sigma_1(Y)
$$
$$
d_k(X+\epsilon Y)=
\begin{cases}
d_k(X)+\epsilon\frac{1}{d_k(X)}A_{ij}X&if\\
\epsilon d_k(Y)&if
\end{cases}
$$
$$
|\delta_k-d_k(X)|=\max_{-1\leq s_k\leq +1}s_k(\delta_k-d_k(X))
$$
$$
\sigma_1(X)=\max_{-1\leq s\leq +1}\sum w_ks_k(d_k(X)-\delta_k)
$$
$$
d\sigma_1(X;Y)=\max_{s(X)}\sum \{w_ks_k(X)\frac{1}{d_k(X)}\text{tr}\ X'A_kY\mid d_k(X)>0\}+
\sum\{w_ks_k(X)d_k(Y)\mid d_k(X)=0\}
$$
$$
\sum\{w_k\frac{1}{d_k(X)}\text{tr}\ X'A_kY\mid \delta_k-d_k(X)>0\}-
\sum\{w_k\frac{1}{d_k(X)}\text{tr}\ X'A_kY\mid \delta_k-d_k(X)<0\}+
\sum\{w_k\frac{1}{d_k(X)}|\text{tr}\ X'A_kY|\mid \delta_k-d_k(X)=0\}
$$
$$
\sigma_\epsilon(X)=\sum w_k\sqrt{(\delta_k-d_k(X))^2 + \epsilon^2}
$$
$$
\mathcal{D}\sigma_\epsilon(X)=\sum \frac{w_k(\delta_k-d_k(X))}{d_k(X)\sqrt{(\delta_k-d_k(X))^2 + \epsilon^2}}A_kX
$$
